{{Description|Barbara's music is the magic that heals her companions.}}
'''Let the Show Begin♪''' is [[Barbara]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|0}}
* This skill deals 2 instances of damage at the start of the skill.
* While this skill is active, Normal and Charged Attacks will heal unconditionally if the attack hits an opponent.
* Every 5 seconds, this skill regenerates health and briefly applies {{color|Hydro|Wet}} to the active character and co-op members who come in contact with Melody Loop's ring.
* The Continuous Regeneration ticks once on Barbara herself upon activation then every 5 seconds for 4 heals in total, which means other characters can benefit from a maximum of 3 heals.
* Melody Loop's {{color|Hydro|Wet}} application on contact has additional properties:
** When an entity enters the ring, an AoE Hydro application will be triggered. That entity then enters a 1.5-second CD before it can be registered for another AoE Hydro application. A hit is registered with a blinking of the Melody Loop as well as a SFX.
** Multiple entities have their separate timers, thus multiple hits can occur in a brief moment.
*** Due to its [[ICD]], Melody Loop can apply Wet to the same target a maximum of twice within 2.5 seconds no matter how many times it is triggered.
** Beside enemies, entities counted for potential trigger of Melody Loop include objects such as Torch, Stoves, [[Mineral]], [[Dendro Core]], [[Cuihua Wood|Cuihua Tree]], [[Mist Flower]], [[Flaming Flower]], [[Dandelion Seed]], [[Sakura Bloom]], etc.
